TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTitle extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來以程式設計方式指定 HTML `` Web Form 網頁的項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-102">Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class to programmatically specify the HTML `<title>` element of a Web Forms page.</span></span> > [!NOTE] > <span data-ttu-id="08c34-103">您也可以藉由設定頁面標題`title`的屬性[@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞，或藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-103">You can also set the page title by using the `title` attribute of the [@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive, or by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.</span></span> ## Examples <span data-ttu-id="08c34-104">下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示網頁的標題列中的目前日期和時間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-104">The following code example demonstrates how to display the current date and time in the title bar of the Web page.</span></span> [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體控制使用預設值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它會建立 HTML``在網頁上的項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-107">It creates an HTML `<title>` element on the Web page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="08c34-108">下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>類別。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-108">The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class.</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="08c34-109">屬性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-109">Property</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="08c34-110">初始值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-110">Initial Value</span></span>| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|<span data-ttu-id="08c34-111">"Title"常值字串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-111">The "title" literal string.</span></span>| ## Examples <span data-ttu-id="08c34-112">下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示網頁的標題列中的目前日期和時間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08c34-112">The following code example demonstrates how to display the current date and time in the title bar of the Web page.</span></span> [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 告知 控制項，XML 或 HTML 項目已剖析，並將該項目加入至控制項的 集合中。

span.span: Notifies the control that an XML or HTML element was parsed and adds that element to the collection of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目加入至控制項是控制項，則方法會設定屬性的常值的字串; 值，否則為基底呼叫方法。If the element added to the control is a control, then the method sets the property with the value of the literal string; otherwise, the base method is called. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先呼叫方法使用`Title`的成員列舉型別。The method first calls the method using the `Title` member of the enumeration. 接下來，將任何子控制項的控制項所呈現。Next, any child controls of the control are rendered. 最後，呼叫方法。Finally, the method is called.

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTML 項目的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the HTML element.
The text of the HTML element.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷 Web 頁面的標題。Use the property to specify or determine the title of the Web page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性動態變更網頁標題的控制項。The following code example demonstrates using the property of an control to dynamically change the title of a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)]
